    public class TokenRequest
extends java.lang.Object

    OIDC token request for getting/exchanging tokens.

      • setCodeVerifier

        public TokenRequest setCodeVerifier(java.lang.String codeVerifier)
        Add code verifier parameter to token request. A challenge must have been sent with previous authorize request.
        Parameters:
        codeVerifier - the code verifier used to generate the challenge
        Returns:
        this
